title: The Racist's Guide to the People of South Africa
description: Politically incorrect, comprehensively unscientific, and exceptionally funny, this guidebook identifies&;and pokes fun at&;the people of the Rainbow Nation. After sorting out the labels Black, English Whites, Afrikaners, and Coloreds, the discussion pushes on to more difficult Why should you never give a White woman a white-gold engagement ring? Why do Indian men always play sports in jeans? and How do Colored gangsters fare in the navy?
author: Simon Kilpatrick
